thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 11 of 99
thread.title: Oscar

author: Oscar
title: Oscar
text: I am based in the U.K. so that originally deterred me from ordering from SSENSE due to customs and slow shipping. However SSENSE is the complete opposite, they ensure no customs are attached to the items ordered and they ship almost instantly. I received my orders within 2 working days on all the instances I have ordered, which in honesty is faster than some UK based companies. Highly recommend.
